headline: Ford Mustang Mach-E sales surpass traditional Mustang
summary: Ford announced that sales of its electric Mustang Mach-E surpassed those of its traditional Mustang in 2024 – a notable milestone for the Detroit automaker in a challenging EV market.

headline: Trump Tariffs Shift? Trump Denies, But Nucor, Enphase, Ford, FCX Lead S&P 500 Rally
